column4: Hi! I've installed Lucid (yes I know it isn't released yet), should I report bugs I find there?
please do, you can use launchpad to do that, you can also use #ubuntu+1 to discuss the bugs you find on lucid
I usually try to do bugreporting (and sometimes triageing) on bugs I find

sometimes you can get a lot more help on launchpad with bugs than in the support channel, if you continually test on your machine I suspect the official release will work without issues out of the box on the machine you tested
